about_the_game:
Echoed World is a puzzle-based platformer, where mechanics and a story are bound together. The protagonist can no longer create life, but he can still manipulate with what has been already created. This process requires a lot of sacrifices to be made, but is often the only way to traverse through a slowly dying world, where creations are turning against their creator.

Features:

  • Use your powers to overcome platforming puzzles and challenges
  • Explore the captivating world set in an unfamiliar, exotic universe
  • Enjoy traversing the levels with full gamepad support
  • Feast your eyes on distinctive hand-painted graphics
  • Let your experience be enhanced by atmospheric soundtrack

About us:

The game was created as a student project and thus is not very lengthy. Our team decided to put it out for free to get something every starting developer needs –
feedback. Most members of our team had no previous experience with game development and Echoed World was made during a few months of tutored game development classes. Our main goal is to show, what can be achieved with a group of talented, yet inexperienced people in a relatively short amount of time.

We hope that you will enjoy this short, yet sweet adventure.
All the feedback we get on Echoed World will push our team even further!

short_description: Experience the epic journey of Algiz, the architect of life, as he seeks to retrieve his stolen power. But not only has his power been stolen. The whole world he designed is on a brink of destruction.
